text.p: American Image Motor Co Inc said Friday its Chief Executive Officer Edward Gelb, Chief Financial Officer Andrew Daniels and company Secretary Valerie Vastano have resigned.

The company said in a statement the resignations follow a recently filed action by the Securities and Exchange Commission alleging that several brokers and traders have manipulated the company's stock.
American Image said it has not been named as a defendant in the action, nor has any of its management.
The company said it is helping with the investigation and denies any involvement in the manipulation of its stock. It said it expects to be vindicated by the investigation.
President and Treasurer Joseph DelNegro has been appointed chief executive officer. Paul Comesky has been named secretary and director.
